name: all
description: Universal profile with all configured MCP servers

browserbase.description: Cloud browser automation capabilities using Browserbase, Puppeteer, and Stagehand

elevenlabs.description: Enables AI clients to interact with ElevenLabs' Text to Speech and audio processing APIs

sanity.description: Connect your Sanity content to AI agents and transform content operations

dataforseo.description: Enables Claude to interact with DataForSEO APIs, allowing access to SEO data

chroma.description: Provides data retrieval capabilities powered by Chroma embedding database

markitdown.description: Document conversion server to transform various file formats to Markdown

sql-server.description: Conversational access to SQL Server databases with natural language querying

apidog.description: API developer tools connecting AI directly to API documentation

everything.description: Reference server exercising all MCP protocol features for testing

fetch.description: Web content fetching and conversion for efficient LLM usage
